i.name: Pyromania
i.description: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for a short duration.

q.name: Disintegrate
q.description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.

w.name: Incinerate
w.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.

e.name: Molten Shield
e.description: Grants Annie and Tibbers increased percentage Damage Resist and damages enemies who attack with basic attacks.

r.name: Summon: Tibbers
r.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.

riot.name: Pyromania
riot.description: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for a short duration.

i1.name: Pyromania
i1.blurb: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for a short duration.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Annie''' gains a stack of ''Pyromania'' when she casts a spell, up to a maximum of 4. At 4 stacks, she gains ''Pyromania''.
i1.description2: {{sbc|Pyromania:}} When '''Annie''' succeeds in her next '''damaging ability''', she consumes all ''Pyromania'' stacks and {{tip|stun|stuns}} enemies hit for {{pp|3|showtype=true|1.25 to 1.75|1 to 11}} seconds.
notes: * {{ai|Incinerate|Annie}} and {{ai|Summon: Tibbers|Annie}} will stun all enemies hit.
* {{ais|Molten Shield|Annie}} reflected damage and {{uis|Tibbers}} damaging aura will not apply the stun.

* The stun applies to the first ability that lands when the stun is available. If you cast {{ai|Disintegrate|Annie}} followed by {{ai|Incinerate|Annie}} while the stun is available and ''Incinerate'' lands first, the stun will be applied through ''Incinerate''.
* The stun '''will not''' be consumed if the target of {{ai|Disintegrate|Annie}} becomes untargetable or the projectile is destroyed by {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}.
* Annie loses all ''Pyromania'' stacks when she is killed.

riot.name: Disintegrate
riot.description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
riot.tooltip: Deals {{ basedamage }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Mana cost and half the cooldown are refunded if Disintegrate kills the target.

q1.name: Disintegrate
q1.blurb: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Annie''' hurls a fireball at the target enemy, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}.
q1.description2: If ''Disintegrate'' kills its target, it refunds {{as|its {{sti|mana}} cost}} and half of its {{sti|cooldown}} is immediately refreshed.

riot.name: Incinerate
riot.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
riot.tooltip: Casts a cone of fire dealing {{ basedamage }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area.

w1.name: Incinerate
w1.blurb: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Annie''' releases a cone of fire in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies in the area.

riot.name: Molten Shield
riot.description: Grants Annie and Tibbers increased percentage Damage Resist and damages enemies who attack with basic attacks.
riot.tooltip:
Annie grants herself and Tibbers {{ damagereduction }}% damage reduction for {{ shieldduration }} seconds.

While the shield is active, enemies who basic attack it take {{ damagereflection }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

e1.name: Molten Shield
e1.blurb: Grants Annie and Tibbers increased percentage Damage Resist and damages enemies who attack with basic attacks.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Annie''' wraps herself and {{ui|Tibbers}} in a fiery aura, reducing damage taken for the next 3 seconds.
e1.description2: Enemies who deal [[basic attack]] damage on '''Annie''' or {{ui|Tibbers}} during this time are dealt {{as|magic damage}}.
notes: * ''Molten Shield'' does not deal damage against towers and their attacks.
* Attacks that {{tip|blind|miss}} against '''Annie''' or {{ui|Tibbers}} will {{sbc|not}} cause the shield to deal damage.

riot.name: Summon: Tibbers
riot.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
riot.tooltip:
Summons Tibbers, dealing {{ initialdamage }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area. For the next 45 seconds, Tibbers burns nearby enemies for {{ auradamage }} (+{{ a2 }}) per second and attacks for {{ tibbersattackdamage }} (+{{ tibbersattackratio }}) as magic damage. Annie can control Tibbers by reactivating this ability.

Tibbers Enrages when: summoned; Annie uses Pyromania on an enemy Champion; and when Annie dies.

Enrages: Tibbers gains 275% Attack Speed and 100% Movement Speed, decaying over 3 seconds.

r1.name: Summon: Tibbers
r1.blurb: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
r1.description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Annie''' summons {{ui|Tibbers}} to the target location in a burst of flame, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to surrounding enemies.
r1.description2: He then remains on the field as a controllable [[Champion summoned units|pet]] for up to 45 seconds.
notes: * {{uis|Tibbers}} aura does not draw tower aggro to '''Annie''' even though the initial cast and {{uis|Tibbers}} basic attacks do so.

riot.name: Summon: Tibbers
riot.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
riot.tooltip:
Summons Tibbers, dealing {{ initialdamage }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area. For the next 45 seconds, Tibbers burns nearby enemies for {{ auradamage }} (+{{ a2 }}) per second and attacks for {{ tibbersattackdamage }} (+{{ tibbersattackratio }}) as magic damage. Annie can control Tibbers by reactivating this ability.

Tibbers Enrages when: summoned; Annie uses Pyromania on an enemy Champion; and when Annie dies.

Enrages: Tibbers gains 275% Attack Speed and 100% Movement Speed, decaying over 3 seconds.

r2.name: Command: Tibbers
r2.blurb: Annie can control Tibbers by reactivating this ability.
r2.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Annie''' directs Tibbers to the target location.
